entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.7°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets beginning overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm over northern sections. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets changing to rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
